duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and strengthen relationships with Master Agents in the Tier 2 category, addressing their feedback and concerns.
Identify growth opportunities and lead account strategy and planning discussions with Master Agents.
Drive and influence Master Agent distribution growth strategy for TbV Retail.
Collaborate with channel leadership to drive and manage the distribution growth of accounts.
Produce and present compelling proposals, presentations, and business reviews that express Total by Verizon's key initiatives and expectations from a distribution and growth perspective.
Assess and improve the performance of each agent and retailer through tailored monthly plans.
Measure and monitor KPIs for respective Indirect Partners, and develop plans to meet and exceed sales targets.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or four or more years of work experience
